PARAM: text:You have reached the IVR System Administration Line
text:Please enter your 4 digit Application Code followed by the pound key
text:The Application Code is not valid.  Let’s try again.
text:For Voice Mail Administration, press 1.  For Broadcast Messages, press 2.
text: For Broadcast Message 1, press 1.  For Broadcast Message 2, press 2.  For Broadcast Message 3, press 3.
text:To enable this broadcast message, press 1.  Otherwise, press 2 to cancel and return to the main menu.
text:To disable this broadcast message, press 1.  Otherwise, press 2 to cancel and return to the main menu.
text:Voice Mail is currently enabled.  To disable Voice Mail, press 1.  Otherwise press 2 to cancel and return to the main menu.
text:Voice Mail is currently disabled.  To enable Voice Mail, press 1.  Otherwise press 2 to cancel and return to the main menu.
text:You've reached the maximum number of attempts.  Good bye.
